name: the rice and the radio
description:
a short twine game about being lonely in space and eating rice. oh, and deciding the fates of all those on this desolate planet with you.

the rice and the radio was written with a 50's-60's sci-fi vibe in mind, with focus on themes of isolation, morality, and the dangers of meddling with science you don't fully understand yet.

--

the rice and the radio was released some time ago on philome.la, and i am happy to now be able to release it on itch.io as well. i hope you enjoy playing it as much as i enjoyed writing it.
